text: Afzalur Rahman was an MLA from 39 no. Jaleswar Vidhan Saba in 1978 from the Janata Party, in 1983 from Independentand in 1991 from the Indian National Congress. And in 1996 from Indian National Congress. In 2006 from Loko Sanmilon Party. And was Pamchyet Minister of Assam. He is from Katarihata, Goalpara. == References == Category:Indian politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Afzalur Rahman
